welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.txt1:
Your livebox is connected to the Orange network. You can now activate your services.
You have 2 ways:
welcome.txt2: click on the link in your sms message sent to n°
welcome.txt3:
log in using the username and password of your internet connection below.
These pieces of information can be found in the letter confirming your subscription.
After confirming your login information, the link in your sms won't be valid anymore.
welcome.txt1_2:
Your Orange Livebox is connected to the network, you can now activate your services by typing below your username and password for internet connection
This information is available in the letter of confirmation of your subscription.

login.warning: Identifiant ou mot de passe erronés. Veuillez recommencer.

welcome.txt4: I don't want to translate this obsolete text

help1.title: IMPORTANT
help1.content: Your username and password are mentionned in the letter confirming your subscription.

service.title: Your services are activated
service.description: You can now restore the Livebox configuration stored in the network.
service.txt1: I want to restore my local personal settings.
service.txt2: I leave it up to Orange to restore my last backup.
service.txt3: I want to continue with the default settings of the Livebox.

local.txt1: Recherche d’une configuration sauvegardée en local.Utilisez le bouton ci-après pour y retrouver le fichier « Livebox » sauvegardé.

fail.title: RESTAURATION échouée
fail.txt1: Un incident est survenu lors de la restauration.
fail.txt2: Aucune restauration n’a pu être effectuée.
fail.txt3: La configuration installée sur votre Livebox est sa configuration par défaut.
fail.access: Vous pouvez maintenant accéder à Internet.
